  • Constructor Details

    • Polynomial

      public Polynomial(double... coefficients)
      Constructs a polynomial with the specified coefficients. The coefficients are ordered from highest to lowest degree.
      Parameters:
      coefficients - The coefficients of the polynomial.

    • Polynomial

      public Polynomial(DataPoint[] interpolationData)
      Constructs a polynomial using interpolation data points. Calculates the coefficients for the polynomial using interpolation.
      Parameters:
      interpolationData - The interpolation data points.

    • Polynomial

      public Polynomial(ArrayList<DataPoint> interpolationData)
      Constructs a polynomial using interpolation data points. Calculates the coefficients for the polynomial using interpolation.
      Parameters:
      interpolationData - The interpolation data points.

      Returns:

      Rounds the given value to the specified number of decimal places.

      Returns:

    • findRootsNewton

      public double findRootsNewton(double start, double precision)
      Finds the roots of the polynomial using Newton's method.
      Parameters:
      start - The starting value for the root search.
      precision - The desired precision of the root.
      Returns:
      The root of the polynomial.

    • toCSV

      public String toCSV(double start, double end, double step)
      Converts the polynomial to a CSV representation.
      Parameters:
      start - The starting x value.
      end - The ending x value.
      step - The step size between x values.
      Returns:
      The polynomial in CSV format.
